title: CAD Designer
description: Join our team and help shape the future of autonomous robotics! We're looking for a talented Designer with expertise in SolidWorks and ANSYS to develop cutting-edge designs for autonomous ground vehicles.

title: Ground Robotics Intern
description: We are seeking a motivated Ground Robotics Intern to join our dynamic team working on cutting-edge Autonomous Ground Robots (AGVs). The ideal candidate should have a basic understanding of Mechatronics principles and experience with Robot Operating System (ROS). This is a fantastic opportunity to gain hands-on experience in autonomous robotics, contribute to innovative projects, and have the chance to publish research papers in top conferences..

title: Manipulator Robotics Intern
description: We are looking for a passionate and driven Manipulator Robotics Intern to join our innovative robotics team, working on advanced robotic arm systems. This role offers an exciting opportunity to work with MoveIt, Robot Operating System (ROS), perception systems, and path planning algorithms to develop intelligent manipulation solutions.
